org.simplity.tp

Interface LogicInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandAction, HelloWorldAction

    public interface LogicInterface
    interface to be implemented by any class that can be called from a service as a service step.
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Value execute(ServiceContext ctx)
      execute logic and return result.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        Value execute(ServiceContext ctx)
        execute logic and return result. Important to note that this method is executed from a singleton instance that is cached for repeated use.This implies that the method must be implemented without using any mutable instance fields. In case you need to track state during the execution, you should have helper class instance for the same.
        Parameters:
        ctx - This is your data area, for input as well as output.
        Returns:
        value, if required. if non-null value is returned it is saved back in ctx with some specific name. refer to Action.java
